title.rendered: Apply Now | Online Application for Ontario University (Undergraduate Application 105)

content.rendered:
Online Application for Ontario University (Undergraduate Application 105), International or Canadian Residents not currently attending an Ontario High School, Ontario University Online Application for Undergrad 105, Fall 2024 Entry Application for Ontario University Admission.

Contents on This Page

Toggle
    • Undergrad 105 Application for Ontario University Admission:
  • Undergraduate Application 105 Fees for Ontario (OUAC) University
  • Ontario University Application Deadline:

Online Application for Ontario University Admission Application 2024 into the Fall 2024 Entry of Ontario University (Current Ontario Secondary School 101 Application Type, and Undergrad 105 for International or Canadian Residents not currently attending an Ontario High School) is open for students who desire to enroll.

Students should take note of the following before applying.

Before Applying,

Understand your eligibility (i.e. if you are eligible for Undergrad 101 or Undergrad 105).

When Applying,

Create an OUAC Account

Mark important application deadlines:

After Applying,

Log in to the website to review important information regarding your admission

 

Table of Contents

Undergrad 105 Application for Ontario University Admission:

Undergraduate Application 105 Fees for Ontario (OUAC) University

Ontario University Application Deadline:

 

Undergrad 105 Application for Ontario University Admission:

This is applicable to International or Canadian applicants not currently attending an Ontario high school. To apply for Ontario University, Fall 2024 Entry, you need Ontario Account to be able to apply for admission.

To begin,

Create an OUAC Account

  • Go to Ontario Secondary School Application (105)
  • Create an OUAC Account
  • Visit your email to confirm account creation and set a password.

How to Login to Ontario (OUAC) University Portal.

  • Go to https://www.ouac.on.ca/apply/nonsecondary/en_CA/user/login
  • Enter your Username and Password
  • Click login

How to Recover Password on Ontario (OUAC) University Portal:

  • Go to https://www.ouac.on.ca/apply/nonsecondary/en_CA/user/reset
  • Enter your Ontario Account Username and Email
  • Click Recover Password

How to Recover Username on Ontario (OUAC) University Portal

  • Go to https://www.ouac.on.ca/apply/nonsecondary/en_CA/user/recover
  • Enter your Date of Birth and Email
  • Click Recover Username

Undergraduate Application 105 Fees for Ontario (OUAC) University

  1. Base Application Fee: $156
  2. Additional Choice Fee: $50/choice
  3. International Service Fee: $10
  4. Transcript Request Fees:
    Click https://www.ouac.on.ca/transcript-request-fees/ to request a transcript.
  5. Supplemental Document Evaluation Fee

  1. Supplemental Program Fee

 

Supplemental Program Fees
Institution Fee

Mode of payment to Ontario University Application

  • Payment can be made using a Credit/Debit card (VISA, MasterCard, American Express, VISA Debit, or Debit MasterCard).
  • Payment can be made using Online banking through selected Canadian banks and credit unions only. (This normally takes 2-5 business days to process.) You must make all payments in Canadian funds.
  • Payment can be made using Flywire (for international payments only). You can pay the Canadian dollar fees in the currency of your choice. This may take 2-5 business days to process.

Note: Payment is non-refundable and is done at the time of application

Ontario University Application Deadline:

September 2024
